SELECT t1.*, (SELECT t2.name FROM tb_dept t2 WHERE t2.dept_id = t1.parent_id) parentName FROM tb_dept t1 WHERE t1.del_flag = 0
AND t1.dept_id IN (${deptDataIds})
SELECT dept_id FROM tb_dept WHERE del_flag = 0
SELECT roleDept.dept_id FROM tb_role_dept AS roleDept LEFT JOIN tb_user_role AS userRole ON userRole.role_id = roleDept.role_id WHERE userRole.user_id = #{userId}

select td.*, (SELECT t2.name FROM tb_dept t2 WHERE t2.dept_id = td.parent_id) parentName from tb_dept td where td.del_flag=0
AND name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
${params.dataScope} order by td.parent_id,td.order_num
